title: Amy’s Son Tries To Arrest A Stranger + Bobby Talks To His Hero: Arkansas Teenager With Perfect ACT Score + Conversations With Strangers
itunes:title: Amy’s Son Tries To Arrest A Stranger + Bobby Talks To His Hero: Arkansas Teenager With Perfect ACT Score + Conversations With Strangers
description:
Amy’s son thought a man was acting suspicious, so he followed him and was going to try to arrest him! Bobby talked to the Arkansas Teenager, Caleb Mallett who got a perfect score on his ACT about how he did it. We all had the homework to go out and have a conversation with a stranger because it’s suppose to be good for you! We report back with our conversations. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
